name: TheDailyDavePodcastingTips
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to the daily Dave for updates to help you podcast from the How to Podcast Series. Practical suggestions for your new or existing podcast to help you gain confidence, develop your skills and reach your audience. Quick suggestions and supportive coaching to help you and your podcast to grow. Everything you need to start a podcast, from your how to source for all things podcasting, check out The How To Podcast Series. I am your host, Dave - and this, is the Daily Dave. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
